mapper.select: SELECT * FROM userinfo WHERE delete_date IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo (name, address, phone, create_date, update_date) VALUES (#{name}, #{address}, #{phone}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE userinfo SET name = #{name}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
